main.cards.BlueCard

Class BlueCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.cards.Card
      • main.cards.BlueCard.BlueCard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerRepairCard, F1RaceCard, LawsuitCard, SalaryTaxDueCard, SkiAccidentCard, TipTheServerCard, WorldCupCard

    public abstract class BlueCard
extends Card
    Represents the Blue Card. This is inherited by different types of Blue Cards

      • getCareer

        public java.lang.String getCareer()
        Returns the name of the Career
        Returns:
        career : String

      • activate

        public void activate()
        Activates the card by checking if the player who drew the card has the same career with the card. If yes, player receives $15000. If not, player pays the other players with that career / bank.

      • getAmount

        public abstract double getAmount()

      • displayCard

        public void displayCard()
        This method displays the card into a 14(max height) x 25(width) unit layout
